thread.section_title: Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Exceeded Expectation
thread.title_full: Exceeded Expectation - Review of Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Aleksandra M
title: Exceeded Expectation
text:
Well....what can I say if you plan a trip to Paris-please consider Pullman next to an Eiffel Tower. Stunning view (and yes you will have few obstacles blocking the direct view) from balcony (which is worth an extra $). Rooms were very, very, very clean and love the modern bathroom amenities: rope (love that one for sure), slippers. There was even a sewing kit that helped me with a small emergency. Friendly staff at front desk (or I should say just front as there was a self check in). Overall absolutely satisfied.
Room Tip: Book a rom with a view...it's worth it especially with balcony in place See more room tips
